findings.label: Transactions With Supplier Name Withheld
findings.detail: £1M in payments where the supplier name is listed as 'NAME WITHHELD'. That's 7.4% of all transactions — citizens cannot scrutinise who receives this money. Unique to Rossendale.

findings.label: Capita Outsourcing Contract
findings.detail: Capita Business Services Ltd is the single largest supplier across 77 transactions. Compare with Liberata at Burnley and Pendle — Rossendale outsources significantly less.

findings.label: Agency Staff (Rapid Recruit)
findings.detail: 1,524 transactions to Rapid Recruit Ltd averaging £1,258 each — the most frequent commercial supplier by value. Shared with Hyndburn and Pendle.

findings.label: Year-End Spending Spike
findings.detail: Customer Services & E-Government spent 7.2x their monthly average in March (£2.2M vs £307K). 14 departments show March spending spikes — the most of any East Lancashire council.

findings.label: COVID/BEIS Grant Pass-Through
findings.detail: 2021/22 was the peak year (£21.3M) due to COVID Business Grants. The 'split payment' detection flags 342 grants in one week alone. Underlying annual spend is £12-14M.

key_findings.title: 3,167 transactions with supplier name withheld — £1M total
key_findings.description: 7.4% of all transactions list the supplier as 'NAME WITHHELD'. This prevents public scrutiny of who receives council money. Unique to Rossendale among the 4 East Lancashire councils.

key_findings.title: Capita Business Services: £5.3M outsourcing contract
key_findings.description: Primary outsourced services provider, used by all 4 councils but Rossendale's largest single supplier. Burnley and Pendle use Liberata for similar services.

key_findings.title: Rapid Recruit: 1,524 agency staff transactions totalling £1.9M
key_findings.description: The most frequent commercial supplier. Averaging £1,258 per transaction suggests daily or weekly agency worker charges. Also used by Hyndburn and Pendle.

key_findings.title: 14 departments spike in March — most of any East Lancashire council
key_findings.description: Customer Services (7.2x), Finance (5.4x), Regeneration (5.1x), and Operations (5.5x) all show significant March spending surges suggesting year-end budget rushes.

key_findings.title: 22 suppliers shared with neighbouring councils — £13.8M total
key_findings.description: Capita, Civica, Mazars and 19 others serve multiple East Lancashire councils. Compare pricing and service scope across all 4 councils.

key_findings.title: 12,906 micro-transactions under £100 (30% of all payments)
key_findings.description: Banner Business Solutions (stationery) accounts for 976 transactions averaging £35. Consolidation could reduce processing costs substantially.
